turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Begum's Fortune.
turn.1: What does the exclusion of the Chinese from the jury system mean in regards to The Begum's Fortune?

turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: This might be an oblique reference to the Chinese Massacre of 1871.
turn.6: Most of the action takes place in Stahlstadt, a vast industrial and mining complex, where ores are made into steel, then made into weapons.
turn.7: Did anything happen while they were mining?
turn.8: Stahlstadt becomes in a few years the world's biggest producer of arms.
turn.10: Schultze is Stahlstadt's dictator, whose very word is law and who makes all significant decisions personally.
turn.11: What happened after he took control?
turn.12: There is no mention of Stahlstadt precise legal status "vis-à-vis" the Oregon or US Federal authorities, but clearly, Schultze behaves as a completely independent head of state.
